Header: 63 More Kids Enjoy the Day at Palaly Airport
Content: Security Force Headquarters - Jaffna (SFHQ-J) facilitated one more visit of pre-school kids to the Palaly International Airport on Monday (17) after a request to that effect was made by the pre-school authorities. 63 kids learning at Shanmugan Pre-School, St Jude Pre-School, Kalavany Pre-School and Gandhy Pre-School in Jaffna, jointly visited the airport, along with their teachers and parents to experience the scenery of aircrafts and other operational units. The visit was arranged by the Security Force Headquarters - Jaffna under the guidance of the Commander, Security Forces - Jaffna, Major General Ruwan Wanigasooriya. The visiting kids were also offered refreshments by SFHQ-J Army personnel.
